column2: "Mma hom nnyɛ abosom
column3: nkyii so wɔnnsen ohonyi
column4: anaa dum bi mma homho
column5: nkyii so mma hom mmfa ɔbo a woedzi no akye nnsi hom asaase mu
column6: mmbɔ hom mu adze mma no: na emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Hom ndzi m'ahomgye afe no
column3: na wondzi m'ahotseweebea no nyi: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Sɛ hom nantsew m'ahyɛdze mu
column3: na hom sie me mbra
column4: na hom yɛ a;"

column2: "ɔno mebɛma hom nyankom atotɔ wɔ n'aber mu
column3: na asaase no ama no ndɔbaa
column4: na haban mu ndua asow n'aba."

column2: "Na hom ewuporow bokodu wenyinaba tsetsew mu
column3: na wenyinaba tsetsew no bokodu odua ber mu: na hom bedzi hom edziban amee
column4: na wɔatsena hom asaase do dwudwoodwo."

column2: "Na mebɛma asomdwee aba asaase no do
column3: na hom ada
column4: na obiara rinnyi hom hu: na mebɛma mbowa bɔn tun do etwa wɔ asaase no do
column5: nkyii so nkrantsee remmfa hom asaase do."

column2: "Na hom betsiw hom atamfo
column3: na wɔbɔtotɔr hom enyim wɔ nkrantsee ano."

column2: "Na hom mu beenu betsiw ɔha
column3: na hom mu ɔha betsiw mpem du: na hom atamfo bɔtotɔr hom enyim wɔ nkrantsee ano."

column2: "Na mebɛdan m'enyim ama hom
column3: na mama hom awowo
column4: na hom adɔr
column5: na mama menye hom ahyɛmu no etsim."

column2: "Na hom bedzi akoradze dadaw a wɔdze esie ma akyɛr no
column3: na hom beyi dadaw no aba wɔ fofor no ntsi."

column2: "Na mibesi me ntamadan wɔ hom mu: na me kra rinnkyir hom."
"Na mebɛnantsew hom mu
column3: na mayɛ hom Nyankopɔn
column4: na hom ayɛ me man."

column2: "Emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a miyii hom fii Egypt asaase do dɛ mma hom nnyɛ hɔn nkowaa; na mebubu hom kɔndua
column3: na memaa hom sii nkyiremben nantsewee no."

column2: "Mbom sɛ hom enntsie me
column3: na wɔannyɛ me mbrasɛm nyinara a;"

column2: "na sɛ hom pow m'ahyɛdze
column3: na hom kra kyir me mbrasɛm
column4: na hom annyɛ me mbransɛm nyinara
column5: na mbom hom sɛɛ m'ahyɛmu a;"

column2: "mo so mebɛyɛ hom iyi; mebɛma nketsenketse akyer hom
column3: mekyerɛ sasawaw nye etsiridii a ɔbɛsɛɛ enyiwa
column4: na ɔbɛma ɔkra atsetsew: na hom bodua hom nduaba kwa

column2: "Na mebɛma m'enyi asa hom
column3: na hom edzi hom atamfo enyim nkogu: hɔn a wokyir hom bɛhyɛ hom do; na hom boguan aber a obi nntsiw hom."

column2: "Na sɛ hom enntsie me wɔ iyinom mpo ntsi a
column3: ɔno mebɛtsea hom mpɛn esuon bio wɔ hom bɔn ntsi."

column2: "Na mubobubu hom tum ahokyerɛ no; na mayɛ hom sor dɛ dadze
column3: nye hom asaase dɛ boran:"

column2: "na hom ahoɔdzen bɛsa kwa: na asaase remma ndɔbaa
column3: nkyii so asaase no do ndua ronnsow n'aba."

column2: "Na sɛ hom nantsew tsia me
column3: na woenntsie me a; medze ɔhaw mpɛn esuon so mebɛba hom do dɛ mbrɛ hom bɔn tse no."

column2: "Na mobɔsoma haban mu mbowa wɔ hom mu a wɔbɛgye hom nsamu mba
column3: na wɔasɛɛ hom fiembowa
column4: na wɔama hom dodow esuar; na hom akwan ayɛ akwamfo."

column2: "Na sɛ hom amma iyinom annsakyer hom amma me
column3: na mbom wɔnantsew tsia me a:"

column2: "ɔno mo so mebɛnantsew etsia hom; na emi mara mabɔ hom mpɛn esuon wɔ hom bɔn ntsi."
"Na medze awerdzi nkrantsee a obedzi ahyɛmu no ho wer mebɛba hom do; na hom aboaboa hom ano wɔ hom nkurow mu: na mobɔsoma ɔyardɔm wɔ hom mu; na woeyi hom ahyɛ ɔtamfo no nsa."
"Sɛ mububu hom edziban dua a
column3: mbaa du bɔto hɔn boodoo wɔ fononoo kor mu
column4: na woeyi hom boodoo ama hom bio wɔ nsɛn do: na hom bedzi

column2: "Na sɛ iyi nyinara mu so hom enntsie me
column3: na wɔnantsew tsia me a;"

column2: "ɔno mebɛnantsew etsia hom ebufuw mu; na mo so matsea hom mpɛn esuon wɔ hom bɔn ntsi."
"Na hom bedzi hom mbabanyin nam
column3: na hom mbabaa nam so hom edzi."

column2: "Na mebɛsɛɛ hom sorɔnsorɔmbea
column3: na metwitwa hom iwihonyi no egu
column4: na matotow hom efun egu hom abosom efun no do; na me kra bekyir hom."

column2: "Na mebɛyɛ hom nkurow amamfo
column3: na medze hom ahotseweebea akɔ ɔsɛɛ mu
column4: na merenngye hom nduhuam ne nka."

column2: "Na medze asaase no bɔkɔ ɔsɛɛ mu: na hom atamfo a wɔtse do no ayɛ hɔn nwanwa."
"Na hom dze mobɔbɔ hom apetse amanaman mu
column3: na matwe nkrantsee no edzi hom ekyir: na hom asaase ayɛ ɔsɛɛ
column4: na hom nkurow ayɛ amamfo."

column2: "Ɔno na asaase no benya n'ahomgye mber ho enyigye
column3: mber tsentsen a ɔda hɔ kɔnn no nyinara
column4: na hom wɔ hom atamfo asaase do no; mekyerɛ ɔno na asaase no bɔhom
column5: na woenya n'ahomgye mber ho enyigye."

column2: "Mber tsentsen a ɔda hɔ kɔnn no nyinara obenya ahomgye; mekyerɛ ahomgye a woennya no wɔ hom ahomgyenda no mu
column3: aber a hom tsenaa do no."

column2: "Na hom mu hɔn a wɔaka no dze
column3: medze abawpa bɛhɛn hɔn akoma mu wɔ hɔn atamfo asaase do; na ahataw a atsew ne ndze etsiw hɔn; na woeguan dɛ obi ruguan nkrantsee ano; na wɔahwehwe ase aber a obi rinntsiw hɔn."

column2: "Na wobefintsiw hɔnho nkorkor
column3: dɛ nkrantsee enyim
column4: aber a obi rinntsiw hɔn: na hom rinnya tum nngyina hom atamfo enyim."

column2: "Na hom bɛsɛɛ wɔ amanaman mu
column3: na hom atamfo asaase bɛmemen hom."

column2: "Na hom mu hɔn a wɔaka no bɛtsetsew wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ mu wɔ hom atamfo asaase do; na eso hɔn egyanom emumuyɛ mu na wɔnye hɔn bɛtsetsew."
"Na wɔbɛka hɔn emumuyɛ
column3: nye hɔn egyanom emumuyɛ
column4: wɔ hɔn mfom a wɔfom mu no mu
column5: na eso dɛ wɔanantsew etsia me ntsi
column8: na medze hɔn baa hɔn atamfo asaase do: sɛ nkyii hɔn akoma monomonomyɛ no brɛ adze
column9: na nkyii wɔpen hɔn emumuyɛ ho ntsea do a;"

column2: "ɔno na mebɛkaa menye Jakob ahyɛmu no; na menye Isaak ahyɛmu no so
column3: na menye Abraham ahyɛmu no so mebɛkaa; na mebɛkaa asaase no."

column2: "Na asaase no so wobegya no hɔ
column3: na woenya n'ahomgye mber mu enyigye
column4: aber a woekwetsi hɔn ada hɔ kɔnn no; na wɔbɛpen hɔn emumuyɛ ho ntsea do: osiandɛ wɔpoow me mbrasɛm

column2: "Na iyi nyinara so mpo ekyir
column3: sɛ wɔwɔ hɔn atamfo asaase do a morommpow hɔn
column4: nkyii so mirinnkyir hɔn
column6: na matsetsew menye hɔn ntamu ahyɛmu no mu; na emi nye EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn:"

column2: "mbom hɔn ntsi mebɛkaa hɔn nananom ahyɛmu no
column3: hɔn a miyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do wɔ amanaman enyim
column4: dɛ mebɛyɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn no: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Iyinom nye ahyɛdze nye ntsɛmbu nye mbra a EWURADZE dze nam Moses ne nsa do hyɛe too ɔno nye Israelmba ntamu wɔ kokwaa Sinai do."
